news.title: New From Justia CLE & Webinars: Podcasting 101
news.description: Want to explore the role of lawyers in the podcasting space? Join Justia Webinars for a CLE-accredited program exploring the law in preproduction, production, and distribution of podcasts. Get the details in this post!
